overview.description: JSON-driven multi-agent development framework with intelligent CLI orchestration (Gemini/Qwen/Codex), context-first architecture, React dashboard frontend, and Python-based semantic code search

key_components.name: CCW CLI Core
key_components.description: Main CLI orchestration layer with command routing, session management, and multi-tool coordination for Gemini/Qwen/Codex

key_components.name: React Dashboard
key_components.description: Web-based dashboard for session visualization, workflow management, and real-time CLI monitoring with React 18 and Radix UI

key_components.name: CodexLens
key_components.description: Multi-modal semantic code analysis platform with tree-sitter parsing, embedding-based search, and LSP support

key_components.name: CCW LiteLLM Bridge
key_components.description: Unified LiteLLM interface layer for model-agnostic LLM calls shared by CCW and CodexLens

key_components.name: MCP Server
key_components.description: Model Context Protocol server implementation for IDE integration and tool exposure

key_components.name: Workflow Skills
key_components.description: Extensible skill system for workflow automation including planning, execution, code review, and issue management

key_components.name: CLI Templates
key_components.description: JSON-driven prompt templates, protocols, and schemas for structured CLI interactions

key_components.name: API Routes
key_components.description: Express-based REST API routes for session, memory, hooks, files, and semantic search operations

key_components.name: Core Services
key_components.description: Business logic services including cache management, session scanning, data aggregation, and authentication

key_components.name: Semantic Search
key_components.description: Hybrid search system combining lexical, semantic, and reranking strategies for code discovery
